page.title: 08THE VET
page.content: {THE VET} ---------- The vet in Grindleford is owned by Mr and Mrs McDonald and helped by Miss James. They also have veterinary surgery in Sheffield . They have a surgery in Grindleford because it is easier for the people that live in Grindleford so they don't have to go to Sheffield. The common problems are stomach upsets and skin conditions. Not many pets get runover but in big towns and cities they do. The most dangerous animals are wild birds and snakes. The animals vets treat are dogs, cats, budgies, snakes and wild birds. The most unusual animals that vets treat are snakes and tarantulas. The vets are very friendly and patient. Today their instruments are very modern and most pets recover rapidly.
